name: indianapolis

the capital and largest city of the US state of Indiana: He was a frequent visitor to Indianapolis. Indianapolis is the ideal location for the business.
More examplesFewer examplesWe dined at a downtown Indianapolis restaurant.He will not be racing at Indianapolis again.He threw three TD passes as the Jets clobbered the Indianapolis Colts, 41-0.
